org.hs.jfc
Class HotComponent.Arbiter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.hs.jfc.HotComponent.Arbiter
Enclosing class:
HotComponent
public static class HotComponent.Arbiter
extends Object

The Arbiter pays a visit to your component upon registration with the HotStation, in the callback method register(Arbiter). It collects information from you about the objects you are available to give and/or take as a HotComponent. For each type you are offering to other components, call one of the offer() methods, supplying along with the Object class the operations by which you will offer it. The operations are constants of HotComponent: any combination of MOVE, COPY, LINK (ALL is a convenience constant of value MOVE|COPY|LINK, and SAMPLE must always be provided for the delivery negotiation). For each type you can receive from other components, call one of the receive() methods in the same manner. In both cases, the HotStation will choose a method of delivery based on:

1) The offer and receive operations available
2) The user's request, expressed with the keyboard modifiers SHIFT/CTRL/ALT

Method Summary

          Inform the Arbiter that you can give objects of type with the operation specified in defaultOperation.

Method Detail

offer

public void offer(Class type,
                  int defaultOperation)
Inform the Arbiter that you can give objects of type with the operation specified in defaultOperation. (Operations are a combination of the HotComponent constants MOVE|COPY|LINK).

offer

public void offer(Class type,
                  int defaultOperation,
                  int allowedOperations)
Inform the Arbiter that you can give objects of type with the operations specified in allowedOperations, and that you prefer the operation defaultOperation. (Operations are a combination of the HotComponent constants MOVE|COPY|LINK).

offerCollection

public void offerCollection(int allowedOperations)
Inform the Arbiter that you can give a collection of objects with the operations specified in allowedOperations. Collections must be delivered as instances of HotComponent.HotCollection, a typed collection wrapper. (Operations are a combination of the HotComponent constants MOVE|COPY|LINK).

receive

public void receive(Class type)
Inform the Arbiter that you can receive objects of type with any operations.

receive

public void receive(Class type,
                    int allowedOperations)
Inform the Arbiter that you can receive objects of type with the operations specified in allowedOperations. (Operations are a combination of the HotComponent constants MOVE|COPY|LINK).

receiveCollection

public void receiveCollection(int allowedOperations)
Inform the Arbiter that you can receive collections of objects with the operations specified in allowedOperations. Collections will be delivered as instances of HotComponent.HotCollection, a typed collection wrapper, and you will of course be able to examine their contents in your isCompatible method before accepting. (Operations are a combination of the HotComponent constants MOVE|COPY|LINK).
